IRS990.MissionDesc: PROMOTING AND ENGAGING IN EDUCATIONAL, CIVIC AND INTERCULTURAL ACTIVITIES IN ORDER TO ENRICH THE LIVES OF MEMBERS OF THE LARGER COMMUNITY.
IRS990.Desc: COMMUNITY SERVICES ACTIVITIES - THE FOUNDATION HAS ESTABLISHED VARIOUS PROGRAMS TO INFLUENCE AND RAISE AWARENESS ABOUT ISSUES AFFECTING THE AFRICAN-AMERICAN COMMUNITY, LOCALLY AND ABROAD. THESE PROGRAMS ARE DESIGNATED AMONGST FIVE MAJOR CATEGORIES - NATIONAL TRENDS AND SERVICES, INTERNATIONAL TRENDS AND SERVICES, SERVICES TO YOUTH, HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICE, AND THE ARTS. THESE ISSUES INCLUDE HEALTHY LIFESTYLES, ACADEMIC, ACHIEVEMENT, ECONOMIC INDEPENDENCE, INTERNATIONAL LITERACY, ASSISTING YOUTH REALIZING THEIR FULL POTENTIAL AND ENCOURAGE APPRECIATION OF A SUPPORT FOR CULTURAL INVOLVEMENT AND ENRICHMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE INCOME EARNED ON THE PRINCIPAL CORPUS MAY BE AVAILABLE FOR DISTRIBUTION AS APPROVED BY TRUSTEES TO CHARITABLE ORGANIZATIONS OR FOR PURPOSES THAT ARE IN ACCORD WITH THOSE OF THE LINKS FOUNDATION, INC.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE GRANTEE PROVIDES LINKS FOUNDATION, INCORPORATED AN ANNUAL GRANT/SCHOLARSHIP REPORT AND/OR AN ACCOUNTING OF GRANT/SCHOLARSHIP FUNDS AT THE END OF GRANTEE'S CURRENT FISCAL YEAR. GRANTEES PROVIDE PROMPTLY OTHER ADDITIONAL INFORMATION, REPORTS AND DOCUMENTS AS REQUESTED TO ALLOW THE LINKS FOUNDATION, INCORPORATED AND ITS REPRESENTATIVES REASONABLE ACCESS DURING REGULAR BUSINESS HOURS TO FILES, RECORDS, ACCOUNTS OR PERSONNEL THAT ARE ASSOCIATED WITH THE GRANTS, FOR THE PURPOSE OF MAKING FINANCIAL REVIEWS, VERIFICATIONS OR PROGRAM EVALUATIONS AS NECESSARY BY THE LINKS FOUNDATION, INCORPORATED.

LINKS FOUNDATION RELIES ON A RELATED ORGANIZATION, LINKS, INC., TO DETERMINE COMPENSATION OF OFFICERS. LINKS, INC. USES THE FOLLOWING METHODS TO ESTABLISH COMPENSATION: - COMPENSATION COMMITTEE - COMPENSATION SURVEY OR STUDY

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS ONE CLASS OF MEMBERS AND IT CONSISTS OF THE MEMBERS OF LINKS, INC.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S MEMBERSHIP VOTES TO ELECT THE GOVERNING BODY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MEMBERS OF THE LINKS FOUNDATION HAVE THE ABILITY TO VOTE ON AND MAKE GOVERNANCE DECISIONS ON BEHALF OF THE THE ORGANIZATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE RETURN WAS PREPARED BY THE OUTSIDE ACCOUNTANTS AND REVIEWED BY SENIOR MANAGEMENT. THE FINAL COPY OF THE 990 WAS PROVIDED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL BOARD MEMBERS, OFFICERS, AND EMPLOYEES SIGN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ANNUALLY THAT CERTIFIES WHETHER A POTENTIAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST EXISTS. INDIVIDUALS ARE REQUIRED TO IMMEDIATELY DISCLOSE THE EXISTENCE OF ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICT SO THAT SAFEGUARDS CAN BE ESTABLISHED TO PROTECT ALL PARTIES. ANY CONFLICT THAT COULD RESULT IN DIRECT OR INDIRECT BENEFIT TO HIS OR HER FAMILY OR ANY ORGANIZATION WITH WHICH THE EMPLOYEE IS AFFILIATED MUST BE DISCLOSED AND AVOIDED, IF AT ALL POSSIBLE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR'S COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY A RELATED ORGANIZATION USING COMPARABILITY DATA, GATHERING COMPENSATION INFORMATION FOR EXECUTIVE DIRECTORS IN SIMILAR ORGANIZATIONS IN THE REGION TO DETERMINE THE APPROPRIATE COMPENSATION. THIS PROCESS WAS DOCUMENTED IN THE BOARD MINUTES. THE LAST COMPENSATION REVIEW TOOK PLACE DECEMBER 2021.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
